Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
22.02.2013 SH SCR17944 Added call of BXA416, used to print invoice specification (numbers) if
number of invoices > GSET_QUANTITY (361) instead to write them to XML in task "Select SIIC <invoices>"; not
if BXA408 is called from creditview
25.01.2013 SH SCR17840 Added GB747.PI.CONVERSION_TO = 'pdf'
26.11.2012 SH SCR17711 Fixed problem with output of <client_name)
09.10.2012 SH SCR17574 Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (CREM)
05.08.2011 SH SCR16667 Step 6 Added test GSET_YESNO (352) = Y to delete
temporary XML file
04.11.2010 GB SCR15945 Changed calculation for <client_name>, extend picture
for client_name from 40 to 120
09.09.2010 GB SCR15746 Changed condition for allow executed
13.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
31.05.2010 GB SCR15560 Added <employee_invoice>
15.11.2009 GB SCR15038 Changed locate for CODE_LANGUAGE into GB if
CODE_TYPE = 6 and CODE_NUMBERN = Month(CLNT901_DATESIGNED)
06.11.2009 SH SCR15026 Changed update of GM102.PI.MESSAGE to use
now ATXL_TEXT instead of hardcoded text
05.11.2009 GB SCR15038 Added <contract_date>
06.10.2009 AS SCR#14971 different seperator for email addresses
01.10.2009 GB SCR14954 Changed text of pi.message
11.09.2009 SH SCR14882 Added PI.EMAILTOCLIENT and step 7 "Send
PDF to the client"
09.07.2008 SH SCR13770 Added update HYPB_TEXT= STIC_SCHTNOCLI
09.07.2008 SH SCR13762 Extended writing of invoice parts
30.06.2008 SH SCR13668 Replaced storing of ARCH by HYPB
11.02.2008 SH SCR13376 Added test on CLNT304_PLEDGEBYPROXY = Y and
STIC_SCHTNOCLI > 0 to store row in MQ197 via BMQ001
10.12.2007 SH SCR12809 Changed contents of <account_manager>
-- Set variables
... in step7 the langauge is switched to client language
... v.X86 = TRUE if BXA408 is running on windows
-- PI.STIC_ID or PI.IFIL_ID is mandatory, else error
-- Get directories
... for XML files
... for PDF files
... for XSL file
... for temp files
... for combined PDF file for website
-- Start creation of XML / PDF files
-- There was no invoice specification created in part 2 because FOP crashes or loops with this large number of invoices.
If this is the case then submit BXA416 to create a specification via Tamino
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
... job is turned to MSGW, performed in GB007
... check for existing directory
... temp directory does not exist
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
... job is turned to MSGW, performed in GB007
-- First store a row to HYPB and update related fields in STIC, if not
already requested (preparations to print the documents via BXA409)
-- 1. Preparations (directories are already determined in parent task)
-- 2. Create XML file
-- 3. Convert XML file to PDF format
-- Error occured in GB747
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
... job is turned to MSGW, performed in GB007
-- 4. Inform users via MQ197 according to the new assignment document
-- 5. Produce PDF for website (only supporte windows platform)
... check if target file already exist (final PDF for website)
... in case of multiple PDF files are created, they have to be combined in one
single PDF for the website presentation
-- 6. Final file handling
... copy PDF file to final PDF path (PDF file is ready for archive)
... step 7 has to be performed, before deletion of temp PDF file, because this
file is used as attachment for the email (cannot use final PDF because an
external program is moving the final PDF to archive)
.. and delete PDF file from temp path and XML file
8. More then 10.000 invoices (there was no invoice specification created in part 2), outside current transaction
... update HYPB_BATCHNO
... update HYPB_HYPA_ID
... prepare file name for XML/PDF file
... if called from website, a combined PDF file of all schedules inside one
invoice upload file has to be generated
-- Variables for output
... Header
... Currency totals
... Invoice details
-- Set variables
-- Write header variables to XML
... text for email has to be written in client language
